TopicTitle: KSP Crashes seconds after reaching Main Menu

Articles.Content:
I recently bought KSP on Steam for Windows 10 64-bit, I'm trying to adjust the settings and the game will randomly freeze with background music still on and when I click the mouse again the game just crashes. Normally I was trying to run the game at, at least 2560x1440 and thought that was the problem but the crashing persisted after lowering to 1920x1080 and even 1280x720. My Video Drivers are updated to the latest version (Nvidia GeForce Game Ready Driver 361.43) and have performed Malware Scans with negative results. I have reinstalled as well to no avail. I have provided the output log and error log below.

Output_Log

http://jpst.it/ErFT

Error Log
http://jpst.it/ErG2

Here's why.

Quote

C:\Program Files (x86)\EVGA\PrecisionX 16\PrecisionXServerHooks.dll:PrecisionXServerHooks.dll (69100000), size: 61440 (result: 0), SymType: '-exported-', PDB: 'C:\Program Files (x86)\EVGA\PrecisionX 16\PrecisionXServerHooks.dll', fileVersion: 5.3.1.0

This software breaks KSP, you'll need to disable or remove it.

9 hours ago, sal_vager said:

Here's why.

This software breaks KSP, you'll need to disable or remove it.

Ahh that did it! Thank you much appreciated for the help!!
